known_issues: Clicking 'hide timer' toggle causes the timer to restart instead of just hiding it

existing_features.title: Fix the 'hide timer' toggle in the TimerVisibilityBar so that toggling timer visibility does not reset or restart any running timer (countdown, stopwatch, pomodoro, interval, or repeating). The toggle should only affect the visual display of the timer panel, leaving all timer state (elapsed time, running status, remaining time) completely unchanged.

projectName: Fix timer restart on hide timer toggle
